name: Youssef Al-Sabbahi
title: Full Stack Web Developer

hero.description: I build engaging digital experiences and advanced web applications that combine high performance with creative design.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer & UI Designer
about.paragraph1: Hello, I'm Youssef, a Full Stack Web Developer with a passion for building exceptional digital experiences. I have extensive experience in both frontend and backend development, with a special focus on modern JavaScript technologies and creative design.
about.paragraph2: My skill set includes creating smooth interactive interfaces with React and Next.js, developing robust APIs, and designing efficient databases. I am deeply interested in user experience and always strive to achieve the perfect balance between aesthetics and functionality in every project.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects that showcase my skills and expertise in web development
